section.heading: (Formerly Sec. 17b-251). Connecticut Partnership for Long-Term Care: Outreach program established

content.p: Sec. 17a-861. (Formerly Sec. 17b-251). Connecticut Partnership for Long-Term Care: Outreach program established.The Office of Policy and Management shall establish an outreach program to educate consumers as to: (1) The need for long-term care; (2) mechanisms for financing such care; (3) the availability of long-term care insurance; and (4) the asset protection provided under sections17b-252to17b-254, inclusive, and38a-475. The Office of Policy and Management shall provide public information to assist individuals in choosing appropriate insurance coverage. See Sec. 17b-252 re overview of program. See Sec. 17b-253 re amendments to Medicaid regulations and state plan, and regulations re determining eligibility of applicants for Medicaid and coverage requirements for long-term care benefits. See Sec. 17b-254 re foundation funds and federal approval and report to General Assembly. See Sec. 38a-475 re precertification of long-term care insurance policies.
